com.sterlingcommerce.ui.web.framework.presentation.data

Interface ISCUIPresentationDataConvertor

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SCUIDBLocalizedDataConvertor

    public interface ISCUIPresentationDataConvertor
    Interface to be implemented and registered with the framework, for presentation data preparation purposes.
    Example Usage: This class will be used when the XAPI output XML is converted into JSON format. SCUIPresentationDataConversionManager#registerConvertor(String, ISCUIPresentationDataConvertor, int, javax.servlet.ServletContext) SCUIJSONUtils statikonda

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getDisplayValue(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String value, SCUIContext context)
      Method which converts the current value into a display specific value.

    • Method Detail

      • getDisplayValue

        java.lang.String getDisplayValue(java.lang.String name,
                                 java.lang.String value,
                                 SCUIContext context)
        Method which converts the current value into a display specific value. name The identifier for which the convertor has to be registered value The current value to be converted context The current UI context The converted value which will be used in the presentation layer, the original value for all other exception cases
